titles.title: A joint resolution to designate May 21, 1987, as "National Flight of the Voyager Day".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

bill.summary: 1/7/1987--Introduced. Designates May 21, 1987, as National Flight of the Voyager Day.
